Package purchasable.items.armors

Class Armor

purchasable.items.armors.Armor
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
Chainmail, FlowerCrown, Shield
public abstract class Armor extends Item
A type of Item that the player can buy in the Shop.
Author:
Bede Nathan, Celia Allen

      public Armor(String name, int healthIncrease, int armorAmount)
      Constructor for the Armor class. Calls the superclass constructor, and sets the private attributes maxHealthIncrease and armorIncrease.
      Parameters:
      name - , of type String. The name of the object.
      healthIncrease - , of type integer. The amount by which the armor increases the monster's maximum health.
      armorAmount - , of type integer. The amount by which the monster's armor amount increases.
